info.description: The backend API for SocialSquare. The private and secure social media platform that doesn't mine your data.

get.summary: Get a list of posts from a specific user.

parameters.name: postname
parameters.description: The post title. If you want to get all posts and not just posts with a specific title, set this parameter to 'None'.

parameters.name: postformat
parameters.description: The post format. Currently you can only get image posts from this API. The only option is 'Image'.
